short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talk with ChatGPT as if you were talking to a real person. Simply talk to it and hear its responses spoken back to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat2GPT - the ultimate browser extension for anyone looking to streamline their communication with ChatGPT. 

With Chat2GPT, interacting with ChatGPT has never been easier or more convenient.

Designed to make conversing with ChatGPT as natural and effortless as possible, Chat2GPT captures your speech and automatically submits it to the ChatGPT webpage, then it's response is spoken back.
 
This allows you to have a seamless and engaging conversation with ChatGPT, just as if you were talking to a real person.

Chat2GPT comes packed with a range of exciting features that will take your chatting experience to the next level. 

Save prompts and access them easily with the click of a button. 

Use Prompt Injection to add context to your saved prompts before having them automatically submitted to ChatGPT.

Chat2GPT gives ChatGPT the ability to show you images related to its text, seamlessly integrating them into the conversation and making it a valuable tool for anyone looking to enhance their chatbot or virtual assistant's user experience.

The ability to select a text file and submit it directly to ChatGPT from the chat interface enables you to streamline your productivity even further. 

And with Chat2GPT's Auto-Prompt feature, you can submit multiple prompts automatically. 
Chat2GPT will submit prompt after prompt waiting for each prompt to be processed before submitting the next. 
This function is perfect for anyone looking to save time and boost productivity.

But Chat2GPT is not just about efficiency - it's also about having fun. 
So whether you're looking to increase productivity or just want to have a friendly chat, Chat2GPT is the perfect solution for you.
